current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To release the City of St. Clair, Missouri, from all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on
			 the use, encumbrance, conveyance, and closure of the St. Clair Regional
			 Airport.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Release of restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the use, encumbrance, conveyance, and
			 closure of the St. Clair Regional Airport

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall release the City of
		St. Clair, Missouri, from all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the
		use, encumbrance, conveyance, and closure of the St. Clair Regional Airport, as
		described in the most recent airport layout plan approved by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, to the extent such restrictions, conditions, and
		limitations are enforceable by the

text.#text: The United States, acting through the

The
		release under subsection (a) shall not be executed before the City of St. Clair,
		or its designee, transfers to the Department of Transportation of the State of
		Missouri—

the
		amounts described in subsection (c), to be used for capital improvements within
		the meaning of airport development (as defined in

for
		no consideration, all airport and aviation-related equipment of the St. Clair
		Regional Airport owned by the City of St. Clair and determined by the
		Department of Transportation of the State of Missouri to be salvageable for
		use.

The
		amounts described in this subsection are the following:

An
		amount equal to the fair market value for the highest and best use of the St.
		Clair Regional Airport property determined in good faith by an independent and
		qualified real estate appraiser on or after the date of the enactment of this
		Act.

An
		amount equal to the unamortized portion of any Federal development grants other
		than land paid to the City of St. Clair for use at the St. Clair Regional
		Airport, which may be paid with, and shall be an allowable use of, airport
		revenue notwithstanding

An
		amount equal to the airport revenues remaining in the airport account for the
		St. Clair Regional Airport as of the date of the enactment of this Act and
		otherwise due to or received by the City of St. Clair after such date of
		enactment pursuant to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall remove the runway end indicator lighting
		system at St. Clair Regional Airport.

header.#text: Requirement To remove runway lighting system

text.#text:
Nothing in this
		section shall be construed to limit the applicability of—

the
		requirements and processes under part 157 of title 14, Code of Federal
		Regulations; or

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2759 IS: To release the City of St. Clair, Missouri, from all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the use, encumbrance, conveyance, and closure of the St. Clair Regional Airport.
